additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Lauroamphoacetate, Glycerin, Coco-Glucoside, Citric Acid, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sodium Benzoate, Glyceryl Oleate, Fragrance, Sodium Hydroxide, Polyquaternium-10, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Avena sativa (oat) Kernel Extract

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Warning: For external use only. When using this product: Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help right away.

description: Aveeno Baby Lightly Scented Wash & Shampoo
name: Baby Lightly Scented Wash & Shampoo
